messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] anyone with older teens in Sonoma County
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Pamela. I plan to go and hope he ll come with! ... From: Pamela Sorooshian  ... I think you ll find some on the HSC list,
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Pamela. I plan to go and hope he'll come with!

-------------- Original message --------------
From: Pamela Sorooshian <pamsoroosh@...>


On Jun 7, 2006, at 9:21 AM, sarah8591@... wrote:

> I'd love to talk to someone in our area (Sonoma County,CA)
> unschooling teenagers. I am just starting with a 16 year old.
> Sarah

I think you'll find some on the HSC list, Sarah. (Homeschool
Association of California) -
<ca-Homeschooling-HSC@yahoogroups.com>

If you can't make it to Albuquerque, for the Live and Learn
conference, there is a very unschooling-friendly conference in
August, in Sacramento, sponsored by HSC. It includes a very large
teen program and most of the teens who participate are unschoolers or
very relaxed homeschoolers. Many from your area.

Look at <www.hsc.org> and click on the 2006 conference link for more
information.

-pam
Unschooling shirts, cups, bumper stickers, bags...
Live Love Learn
UNSCHOOL!
<http://www.cafepress.com/livelovelearn>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
